FROM IBULK (SINGAPORE) PTE LTD / WWW.IBULK-SIN.COM
FOR CARGO/ORDER: DRYCARGO@IBULK-SIN.COM
FOR TONNAGE: TONNAGE@IBULK-SIN.COM
REPLY UNSUBSCRIBE NOT TO RECEIVE CIRCULATION
+++ STRICTLY NO RECIRCULATION +++
GOOD DAY,
PLEASED TO HEAR WHAT YOU CAN PROPOSE FOR OUR FOLLOWING IN HOUSE TONNAGE:
- CAN TRADE GOA/PG/FULL RED SEA INCLUDING YEMEN/DJIBOUTI ETC
- CAN TRY ANY DIRECTION PREFER VOYAGE TRY TCT
- OPEN RED SEA ON AROUND 08 - 18 SEPTEMBER, 2024
- ETA AQABA  ON AROUND 12 - 22 SEPTEMBER, 2024
- ETA BLACK SEA ON AROUND  17 - 27 SEPTEMBER, 2024
MV "INCE NORTHWIND"
SD/BC BLT 2023 SINGAPORE FLAG CLASS NK
ABT 63,500MT DWT ON 13.52 M SSW
LOA/BEAM/DEPTH 199.98/32.24/19.30M
GRT/NRT 36,500/21,500
4 X 30.5 TS CRANES + 12CBM GRABS
80,750.00 CBM GRAIN
CO2 FITTED
SPEED CONS : ABT 13.0K  L ON ABT 23.00MT IFO + ABT 0.1 MT MDO  ABT 13.50K B ON ABT 21.30MT IFO + ABT 0.1 MT MDO
(ECO SPEED/CONSUMPTION IS AVAILABLE AND WILL BE PROVIDED UPON FIRM INTEREST.)
PORT CONS :
IDLE ABT 2.50 MT IFO / WWW ABT 4.5 MT IFO (INCL. BALLAST OPERATION)
VESSEL HAS LIBERTY TO USE ADDITIONAL MDO WHEN MANOEUVERING, PASSING FROM STRAITS, BERTHING OR  UNBERTHING, AT HEAVY SWELLS, IN CONFINED WATERS, HOLD CLEANING ETC.
"ALL DETAILS ARE GIVEN IN GOOD FAITH AND WITHOUT GUARANTEE"
Warm Regards.,
Thomas Hermantoso
